participant_1.background:
I'm not so worried about the weather because I don't have kids.
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.
i live in a retirement home.
i like to create websites.
i live on an island.

participant_2.background:
My first major purchase was my laptop, and I still use it every day.
my favorite jello is the blue one.
I value my friendships and family relationships above all else, and I make time for them every day.
i have a poodle named nanette.
my mom is an osteopath.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
Hey, I'm doing good! How are you?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking.
I'm not worried about the weather because I don't have kids.  What's your favorite kind of jello?
My favorite jello is the blue one! What about you?
I don't have a favorite kind, but I know a lot of people who love the blue one.
Yeah, it's definitely the most popular flavor.
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends this weekend.  What are you doing?
I'm going to make time for my friendships and family relationships, as well as work on my website.  I also have a poodle named Nanette.
That sounds like a good plan.  I'm glad you're making time for your loved ones.  What kind of website do you have?
It's a website about my mom, who is an osteopath.  She's really helped me in the past, so I wanted to share her story with others.
That's so nice of you!  I'm sure she'll appreciate it.
